identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a 'Neuro-Harmonic' Speech Therapy SaaS that bridges clinical precision with Montessori-style warmth. Avoid sterile medical tropes.
principles: Fusion: Medical Precision x Montessori Warmth
Emotion First: Every interaction reassures or motivates
Content is King: Data tells a patient's recovery story
Contrast: Soft backgrounds vs. Sharp data points

headings.usage: Used for all section titles, dashboard metrics, and hero text. Digits in Manrope are monospaced-friendly, perfect for data.

body.usage: Used for long-form text, patient notes, and UI labels. High readability at small sizes.

mono.usage: Used for clinical codes, timestamps, and technical data.

primary.name: Deep Periwinkle
primary.usage: Primary actions, active states, brand identity. Bridges medical (blue) and creative (purple).

secondary.name: Soft Sage
secondary.usage: Success states, progress indicators, positive reinforcement.

dark_mode.vibe: Deep focus, 'Control Room' for therapists working late.

marketing.name: The Tetris Grid
marketing.rules: Use grid-cols-12. Mix col-span-4 (square), col-span-8 (hero), and col-span-6 (feature). Never equal columns.

dashboard.name: The Control Room
dashboard.rules: Dense grid-cols-4. Widgets must stretch (h-full). No jagged bottoms. Use 'subgrid' where possible.

buttons.interaction: Scale down slightly on click (active:scale-95). Hover lifts shadow.

cards.style: Flat with subtle border in Light Mode. Glowing border in Dark Mode.

inputs.style: bg-transparent border-b-2 border-border focus:border-primary (Underline style) OR standard Shadcn input with rounded-lg.

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: backdrop-blur-xl bg-white/70 border border-white/20 (Light) / bg-black/60 border-white/10 (Dark)
visual_enhancers.gradients: Use subtle 'mesh' gradients for hero backgrounds, never for buttons.

hero_patient.alt: Playful boy with CD, vibrant yellow background
hero_patient.usage: Main Landing Page Hero - evokes joy and breaking barriers.

feature_audio.usage: Background for 'Voice Analysis' or 'Progress Diary' cards.

assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react' for standard UI. Use 'phosphor-icons' (Duotone) for feature highlights.

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use generic 'medical blue' (#3B82F6). Use the custom Deep Periwinkle.
DO NOT center-align long text. Left align for readability.
Use 'sonner' for toasts, not default alerts.
Ensure 4.5:1 contrast ratio for all text.
Create a 'Theme Toggle' in the navbar.
